roleset.name: cause to be hollow

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: They hollow out the bat and stick the cork in there [*PRO*-1] to mask the hollow sound .

roleset.note: Frameset created by Miriam. Frames file for 'hollow out' based on sentences in wsj. See Verbnet class clear-10.3.

roleset.name: create an empty space

example.name: All args
example.text: *PRO* hollowing the countryside and small towns of their livelihood.
